member.name: T:Kvpbase.Classes.ConcurrentList`1
member.summary: A thread-safe list with support for: 1) negative indexes (read from end). "myList[-1]" gets the last value 2) modification while enumerating: enumerates a copy of the collection. Taken from StackOverflow (see link in seealso).

member.name: P:Kvpbase.Classes.ConcurrentList`1.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: support for negative indexes (read from end). "myList[-1]" gets the last value

member.summary: If not null, match objects updated after the specified time (UTC).

member.name: P:Kvpbase.Containers.EnumerationFilter.LastAccessAfter

member.summary: If not null, match objects with the specified MD5 hash value.

member.name: P:Kvpbase.Containers.EnumerationFilter.ContentType
member.summary: If not null, match objects of the specified content type.

member.name: P:Kvpbase.Containers.EnumerationFilter.SizeMin
member.summary: If not null, match objects of at least the specified size.

member.name: P:Kvpbase.Containers.EnumerationFilter.SizeMax
member.summary: If not null, match objects that are less than the specified size.

member.name: P:Kvpbase.Containers.EnumerationFilter.Tags
member.summary: If not null, match objects that contain each of the supplied tags.

member.name: M:Kvpbase.Containers.StorageDriver.Write(System.String,System.Int64,System.IO.Stream,System.String@,Kvpbase.Containers.ErrorCode@)
member.summary: Write an object.
member.param: The full path and filename of the object. The file will be re-read in its entirety to calculate the MD5.

member.name: M:Kvpbase.Containers.StorageDriver.WriteRange(System.String,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.IO.Stream,System.String@,Kvpbase.Containers.ErrorCode@)
member.summary: Write bytes to a specific position in an existing object. The file will be re-read in its entirety to calculate the MD5.
member.param: The full path and filename of the object.
The byte position to which data should be written.
The content length of the bytes to write.
The MD5 of the updated object.

member.summary: Read an object.
member.param: The full path and filename of the object.
The content length of the object.
The stream containing the object data.

member.name: M:Kvpbase.Containers.StorageDriver.ReadRange(System.String,System.Int64,System.Int32,System.IO.Stream@,Kvpbase.Containers.ErrorCode@)
member.summary: Read bytes from a specific range in an existing object.
member.param: The full path and filename of the object.
The byte position from which data should be read.
The number of bytes to read.
The stream containing the object data.
